/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes stand tall, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The road itself is divided by a median, guiding the viewer's eye through the scene. On the right side of the road, a green sign stands out, although the text on it is not visible in the image. The overall scene is a blend of man-made structures and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance.
